fileExtensionFilter.name: ali-ext: filter test or build files or directory
ali-ext: filter demo/example/test folder or file
ali ext: filter build html files
fileExtensionFilter.description: ali ext: filter build html files

stringLineFilter.name: logger methods
stringLineFilter.description: logger will not displayed on frontend

stringLineFilter.name: path\.join\(
stringLineFilter.description: Ignore joined paths (many false positives from 'join' LSM)

stringLineFilter.name: ali ext : filer div className tag
stringLineFilter.description: ali ext : filer div className tag

stringLineFilter.name: Multi single-word strings
stringLineFilter.description: Filters lines with multiple single-word strings that are either lowercase, camelcase, or contain underscores/numbers/punctuation.

stringLineFilter.name: indexOf method
stringLineFilter.description: literal inside indexOf method will not shown in frontend

stringLiteralFilter.name: template
stringLiteralFilter.description: template alone is usually always a program element

stringLiteralFilter.name: ali ext: var filter
stringLiteralFilter.description: ali ext: var filter

stringLiteralFilter.name: ali ext: all Upper and Lower case
stringLiteralFilter.description: ali ext: all Upper and Lower case

stringLiteralFilter.name: Camel case word
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters camel case word (containing one or more lowercase letters followed by one or more uppercase letters)

stringLiteralFilter.name: HTML programmatic settings
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters common HTML programmatic settings

stringLiteralFilter.name: Numbers with optional letters
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters numbers with optional letters

stringLiteralFilter.name: ali18n-ext: filter import statement
stringLiteralFilter.description: filter jsx import statement

stringLiteralFilter.name: Embedded special chars
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters programmatic elements that contain any of the characters in this character-class expression

stringLiteralFilter.name: ali ext: filter html|js tag
stringLiteralFilter.description: ali ext: filter html|js tag

stringLiteralFilter.name: Boolean
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters boolean strings

stringLiteralFilter.name: ali ext: filter demo
stringLiteralFilter.description: ali ext: i18n filter

stringLiteralFilter.name: ali ext: font family filter
stringLiteralFilter.description: ali ext: font family filter

stringLiteralFilter.name: Path only 1
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters paths that don't start with slash; e.g. admin/create

stringLiteralFilter.name: ali ext: filter var eg:item.minPrice
stringLiteralFilter.description: ali ext: filter var eg:item.minPrice

stringLiteralFilter.name: ali ext: i18n filter
stringLiteralFilter.description: ali ext: i18n filter

stringLiteralFilter.name: ali18n-ext: filter medusa related get method call
stringLiteralFilter.description: filter strings with medusa related method call

stringLiteralFilter.name: name=value or name==value
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters name=value and name==value strings

stringLiteralFilter.name: ali18n-ext: filter jsx variable|method call
stringLiteralFilter.description: filter strings containing variable|method call

stringOperandFilter.name: (console.)?sessionId
stringOperandFilter.description: Session ID's are unlikely to be shown to users.

stringOperandFilter.name: Class
stringOperandFilter.description: Filters class values, e.g. numberClass = "[object Number]"

stringOperandFilter.name: sql
stringOperandFilter.description: Filters strings assigned to SQL-named variables

stringOperandFilter.name: index
stringOperandFilter.description: Assume indices are not displayed in UI

stringOperandFilter.name: Names
stringOperandFilter.description: Assume names are not displayed in UI

extension.description: Scalar vector graphics files can contain HTML
.NET web custom control can contain HTML
Embedded JavaScript files can contain HTML
jsp fragment files can contain HTML
Active Server Pages can contain HTML
Java Server Pages can contain HTML
Web include files can contain HTML

stringRetentionPattern.name: Technical Terms
stringRetentionPattern.description: Do not filter camel case technical terms and abbreviations that appear in dictionary.

generalPattern.name: Font family
generalPattern.description: Detect hardcoded font names. Should be either locale-dependent or a Unicode font.

generalPattern.name: HTML parameters
generalPattern.description: Finds parameters inside tags, ignoring numbers only

generalPattern.name: Font reference in HTML
generalPattern.description: Detect hardcoded font names. Should be either locale-dependent or a Unicode font.

generalPattern.name: Font style
generalPattern.description: The style of a font (e.g. bold, italic) may not not look good in a locale's preferred font.

stringLiteralFilter.name: name=value or name==value
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters name=value and name==value strings

stringLiteralFilter.name: ali18n-ext: filter jsx variable|method call
stringLiteralFilter.description: filter strings containing variable|method call

stringLiteralFilter.name: ali ext: i18n filter
stringLiteralFilter.description: ali ext: i18n filter

stringLiteralFilter.name: Simple filename
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filenames are usually locale-independent

stringLiteralFilter.name: Close brace code
stringLiteralFilter.description: Contains no open brace but ends with a close brace

stringLiteralFilter.name: Word starts with special char
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters strings that contain a word that starts with one of these

stringLiteralFilter.name: File extension - Image
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters strings that contain only an image file extension

stringLiteralFilter.name: File extension - General
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters strings that contain only a file extension: .xxx

stringLiteralFilter.name: Path only
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters strings consisting only of paths, e.g. \data\sports\

stringLiteralFilter.name: String starts with special char
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters strings where the first word begins with one of these

stringLiteralFilter.name: File extension - Source
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters strings that contain only a source code file extension

stringLiteralFilter.name: Server-side code
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters server-side code

stringLiteralFilter.name: File extension - Other
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters strings that are one of these file extensions

stringLiteralFilter.name: Filepath or URL
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters strings consisting only of filepaths or URLS, e.g. c:\data\sports and http://www.lingoport.com

stringLiteralFilter.name: Open brace code
stringLiteralFilter.description: Starts with various punctuation, then open brace but no close brace

stringLiteralFilter.name: HTML entities
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters strings containing one or more HTML entities

stringLiteralFilter.name: JSP tag
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters jsp tags

stringLiteralFilter.name: Underscored or dashed
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters underscored or dashed strings. For example: "some-word", "{some_word}", "-word"

stringLiteralFilter.name: Script block
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters script blocks

stringLiteralFilter.name: ID
stringLiteralFilter.description: ID alone is usually always a program element

stringLiteralFilter.name: UTF-8 encoding
stringLiteralFilter.description: UTF-8 encoding string is not translatable

stringLiteralFilter.name: Non-letter chars only
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters strings consisting entirely of non-letter characters and linefeeds

stringLiteralFilter.name: Filepath
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters strings consisting only of filenames and paths, e.g. data\sports.cfg

stringLiteralFilter.name: Include statement
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters out include text. For example: include(header.inc)

stringLiteralFilter.name: HTML tags/Special chars only
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters a literal that contains only HTML tags or special characters. If it contains display text between the tags, then it is not filtered

stringLiteralFilter.name: Single letter
stringLiteralFilter.description: Filters single letter strings which are highly unlikely to require translation. Single Letters

stringOperandFilter.name: (console.)?sessionId
stringOperandFilter.description: Session ID's are unlikely to be shown to users.

stringOperandFilter.name: Class
stringOperandFilter.description: Filters class values, e.g. numberClass = "[object Number]"

stringOperandFilter.name: sql
stringOperandFilter.description: Filters strings assigned to SQL-named variables

stringOperandFilter.name: index
stringOperandFilter.description: Assume indices are not displayed in UI

stringOperandFilter.name: Names
stringOperandFilter.description: Assume names are not displayed in UI

htmlIgnoreTag.name: base tag
htmlIgnoreTag.description: Specifies a default href or target for page links

htmlIgnoreTag.name: var tag
htmlIgnoreTag.description: Defines a variable part of a text

htmlIgnoreTag.name: col tag
htmlIgnoreTag.description: Defines attributes for one or more columns in a table

htmlIgnoreTag.name: link tag
htmlIgnoreTag.description: Defines a relationship between page and external source

htmlIgnoreTag.name: hr tag
htmlIgnoreTag.description: Creates a horizontal line in page

htmlIgnoreTag.name: area tag
htmlIgnoreTag.description: Defines an area inside an image-map

htmlIncludeTag.name: quote tag
htmlIncludeTag.description: Defines a short quote by placing quotes around it

htmlIncludeTag.name: ins tag
htmlIncludeTag.description: Defines text that has been inserted

htmlIncludeTag.name: del tag
htmlIncludeTag.description: Defines text that has been deleted

htmlIncludeTag.name: font tag
htmlIncludeTag.description: Specifies font face, size and color of text
